about_the_game:
“When I used to read fairy tales, I fancied that kind of thing never happened, and now here I am in the middle of one!”, Alice.

Remember 12 great moments from Lewis Carroll’s classic book.
Set up the jigsaw puzzles in a refreshing reinterpretation created in a beautiful style by @Katia.Numakura.

  • Complete the jigsaw puzzle scenes at five different levels of difficulty - from 60 to 735 pieces.
  • Relax with a comforting and exclusive soundtrack .
  • Features include zooming the scene, highlighting border pieces, highlighting pieces from a specific quadrant, shuffling the remaining pieces, previewing the scene, dragging the board.
  • Complete the puzzle in any mode and unlock the image for download. Share it to express your love ❤! Use it as a desktop background to inspire your day 🌞!

This game is inspired by the book “Alice in Wonderland”, by Lewis Carroll, a recommended reading for everyone.

About his book, the author mentioned: “I'm very much afraid I didn't mean anything but nonsense. Still, you know, words mean more than we mean to express when we use them; so a whole book ought to mean a great deal more than the writer means. So, whatever good meanings are in the book, I'm glad to accept as the meaning of the book.”

What is the meaning of Alice in Wonderland for you? Share your thoughts in our community forum!
Now you can customize the screenshots, replacing the quotes we selected with your own reflections. Save them and share them.

About the Game

“When I used to read fairy tales, I fancied that kind of thing never happened, and now here I am in the middle of one!”, Alice.

Remember 12 great moments from Lewis Carroll’s classic book.
Set up the jigsaw puzzles in a refreshing reinterpretation created in a beautiful style by @Katia.Numakura.

  • Relax with a comforting and exclusive soundtrack .
  • Features include zooming the scene, highlighting border pieces, highlighting pieces from a specific quadrant, shuffling the remaining pieces, previewing the scene, dragging the board.
  • Complete the puzzle in any mode and unlock the image for download. Share it to express your love ❤! Use it as a desktop background to inspire your day 🌞!

This game is inspired by the book “Alice in Wonderland”, by Lewis Carroll, a recommended reading for everyone.

About his book, the author mentioned: “I'm very much afraid I didn't mean anything but nonsense. Still, you know, words mean more than we mean to express when we use them; so a whole book ought to mean a great deal more than the writer means. mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:

short_description: “Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle!”, said Alice. A new jigsaw puzzle game to remember a beloved classic story. Now with 12 beautiful illustrations created by Katia Numakura, with inspiration from “Alice in Wonderland” by Lewis Carroll.
